updates.HtmlString: Set Boosters Slot 8 overrides + all Slot 9 cards now include regular cards, not just showcase cards.
Added Set Boosters for the first time ever.
Collector Booster slot 1/2 now pull M/U AS WELL from only retro frame, New-to-Modern, and MH1 reprints. Oops;)
'Yavimaya, Cradle of Growth' no longer considered New-to-Modern.
Collector Booster slot 1/2 now pull from only retro frame, New-to-Modern, and MH1 reprints.
Collector Booster now has proper amount of common (4) and 'foil sketch or retro frame c/u' (2) card sections.
Draft Booster's default cards now restricted to the base card set (num 1-261).
Draft Booster now includes chance of regular mythics.
